content:
Hi, I am planning on formalising a proof of the attached theorem. I wanted to make sure there was no ongoing work on this before I start on my work.
image.png

Hi Aaron,

Bad news I'm afraid.

I was browsing pull requests on the mathlib4 GitHub repository with the t-combinatorics label a few weeks ago (to make sure there was no ongoing work on the Kővári–Sós–Turán theorem) and remembered seeing a pull request for the Bondy-Chvátal theorem with Dirac's theorem and Ore's theorem as corollaries #15720.
Aaron Hill has marked this topic as resolved.
A couple of friends and I have a proof of Kővari-Sós-Turán if you haven't done it already, but it needs some cleaning up

Mauricio Collares said:

A couple of friends and I have a proof of Kővari-Sós-Turán if you haven't done it already, but it needs some cleaning up

Thanks for the offer but I already made a PR #20240. I proved it after finishing Erdős-Stone-Simonovits (that I'm cleaning up now) to pad out my thesis. :sweat_smile:
